name: CVE-2000-0052
description: Red Hat userhelper program in the usermode package allows local users to gain root access via PAM and a .. (dot dot) attack.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:linux:6.0:*:i386:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:turbolinux:turbolinux:4.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:turbolinux:turbolinux:4.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:turbolinux:turbolinux:6.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:mandrakesoft:mandrake_linux:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:linux:6.1:*:i386:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:turbolinux:turbolinux:3.5b2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:mandrakesoft:mandrake_linux:6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
